setupZeroContent.en-us: We detected your language using your phone's default language but you can change the language of Leeloo AAC if you like.
setupZeroContent.en-gb: We detected your language using your phone's default language but you can change the language of Leeloo AAC if you like.
setupZeroContent.de-de: Wir haben Ihre Sprache anhand der Standardsprache Ihres Telefons erkannt. Sie können jedoch die Sprache von Leeloo AAC ändern.
setupZeroContent.tr-tr: Telefonunuzun varsayılan dilini kullanarak dilinizi tespit ettik ancak isterseniz Leeloo AAC'nin dilini değiştirebilirsiniz.
setupZeroContent.fr-fr: Nous avons détecté votre langue en utilisant la langue par défaut de votre téléphone mais vous pouvez changer la langue de Leeloo AAC.
setupZeroContent.es-mx: Hemos detectado tu idioma utilizando el idioma por defecto de tu teléfono pero puedes cambiar el idioma de Leeloo AAC si así lo deseas.
setupZeroContent.pt-br: Detectamos seu idioma usando o idioma padrão do seu telefone. Mas você pode alterar o idioma no Leeloo ACC, se desejar.

setupOneContent1.en-us: Thank you so much for downloading. In order to personalize your experience, you need to setup this application.
setupOneContent1.en-gb: Thank you so much for downloading. In order to personalize your experience, you need to setup this application.
setupOneContent1.de-de: Vielen Dank für das Herunterladen. Um Ihre Erfahrung zu personalisieren, müssen Sie diese Anwendung einrichten.
setupOneContent1.tr-tr: İndirdiğiniz için çok teşekkürler. Hadi hemen, deneyiminizi kişiselleştirmek için bu uygulamayı kuralım.
setupOneContent1.fr-fr: Merci beaucoup pour le téléchargement. Afin de personnaliser votre expérience, vous devez configurer cette application.
setupOneContent1.es-mx: Muchas gracias por descargar esta aplicación. Para personalizar tu experiencia es necesario configurar la misma.
setupOneContent1.pt-br: Muito obrigado por baixar. Para personalizar sua experiência, você precisa configurar este aplicativo.

setupOneContent2.en-us: Follow this 2 steps and start using Leeloo AAC app right away.
setupOneContent2.en-gb: Follow this 2 steps and start using Leeloo AAC app right away.
setupOneContent2.de-de: Befolgen Sie diese 2 Schritte und beginnen Sie sofort mit der Leeloo AAC App.
setupOneContent2.tr-tr: Bu 2 adımı izleyin ve hemen Leeloo AAC uygulamasını kullanmaya başlayın.
setupOneContent2.fr-fr: Suivez ces 2 étapes et commencez à utiliser l'application Leeloo AAC tout de suite.
setupOneContent2.es-mx: Sigue estos dos pasos para comenzar a utilizar Leeloo AAC de forma inmediata.
setupOneContent2.pt-br: Faça esses 2 passos para começar a utilizar Leeloo ACC.

setupTwoContent.en-us: From the following avatars, choose the avatar that best resembles the user of this AAC application.
setupTwoContent.en-gb: From the following avatars, choose the avatar that best resembles the user of this AAC application.
setupTwoContent.de-de: Wählen Sie aus den folgenden Avataren den Avatar aus, der dem Benutzer dieser AAC-Anwendung am ehesten entspricht.
setupTwoContent.tr-tr: Aşağıdaki avatarlardan, bu AAC uygulamasının kullanıcısına en çok benzeyen avatarı seçin.
setupTwoContent.fr-fr: Parmi les avatars suivants, choisissez l'avatar qui ressemble le mieux à l'utilisateur de cette application AAC.
setupTwoContent.es-mx: De los siguientes avatars, elige el que más se asemeje al usuario de esta aplicación AAC.
setupTwoContent.pt-br: Dos seguintes avatares, escolha o que melhor se assemelha com o usuário deste aplicativo ACC.

setupThreeContent.en-us: What would you like me to call you when referring to you in the application?
setupThreeContent.en-gb: What would you like me to call you when referring to you in the application?
setupThreeContent.de-de: Was möchtest du, wenn ich dich anrufe, wenn ich dich in der Bewerbung anrufe?
setupThreeContent.tr-tr: Uygulama içinde senden bahsetmek için adına ne dememi istersin?
setupThreeContent.fr-fr: Qu'aimeriez-vous que je vous appelle lorsque je me réfère à vous dans la application?
setupThreeContent.es-mx: ¿Cómo te gustaría que te llame cuando me refiera a ti en la aplicación?
setupThreeContent.pt-br: Como gostaria de ser chamado no aplicativo?

setupFourContent.en-us: Let's setup the speech voice settings when cards are pressed.
setupFourContent.en-gb: Let's setup the speech voice settings when cards are pressed.
setupFourContent.de-de: Lassen Sie uns die Sprachstimmeinstellungen einstellen, wenn Karten gedrückt werden.
setupFourContent.tr-tr: Kartlara basıldığında çıkacak konuşma sesinin ayarlarını yapalım.
setupFourContent.fr-fr: Configurons les paramètres de la voix vocale lorsque les cartes sont pressées.
setupFourContent.es-mx: Configuremos las propiedades de voz cuando las tarjetas son presionadas.
setupFourContent.pt-br: Vamos configurar as propriedades de voz.

demoSpeechText.en-us: Hello, this is a test speech!
demoSpeechText.en-gb: Hello, this is a test speech!
demoSpeechText.fr-fr: Bonjour, ceci est un test de discours!
demoSpeechText.es-mx: ¡Hola, esto es una prueba de voz!
demoSpeechText.pt-br: Olá, este é um teste da voz

setupFiveContent.en-us: Setup is successfully completed. Now you can start using Leeloo AAC app. Don't forget to tell your friends about us!
setupFiveContent.en-gb: Setup is successfully completed. Now you can start using Leeloo AAC app. Don't forget to tell your friends about us!
setupFiveContent.de-de: Das Setup wurde erfolgreich abgeschlossen. Jetzt können Sie die Leeloo AAC App verwenden. Vergiss nicht, deinen Freunden von uns zu erzählen!
setupFiveContent.tr-tr: Kurulum başarıyla tamamlandı. Artık Leeloo AAC uygulamasını kullanmaya başlayabilirsiniz. Arkadaşlarınıza bizi önermeyi unutmayın!
setupFiveContent.fr-fr: L'installation est terminée avec succès. Maintenant, vous pouvez commencer à utiliser l'application Leeloo AAC. N'oubliez pas de parler de nous à vos amis!
setupFiveContent.es-mx: La configuración ha sido terminada. Ya puedes comenzar a usar la aplicación Leeloo AAC. ¡No olvides contarle a tus amigos sobre nosotros!
setupFiveContent.pt-br: A configuração terminou com sucesso. Agora você pode usar o aplicativo Leeloo ACC. Não se esqueça de contar aos seus amigos sobre nós!
